The English Thoroughbred is available in Star Stable Horses! Thoroughbreds are a spirited breed that shine on the race track! Raise and care for your horse before they join you in Star Stable Online!

Update alert - we’ve tidied things up and added to the fun with awesome new animations, sounds, stars, and icons!

Say hello to the Gotland Pony, the latest addition to Star Stable Horses! On Jorvik, the breed is a favorite companion for explorers, as these athletic ponies are keen to carry riders across any terrain. Hungry, stubborn, and kind, this little fella is an ideal training horse!
